sentences.english: Competitor must observe the rules laid down by Competition Committee.
sentences.chinese: 赛员必须遵守比赛规例。

sentences.english: This Regulation shall apply to every seafarer employed under a crew agreement.
sentences.chinese: 本规例适用于每一名根据船员协议受雇的海员。

sentences.english: Enforcement of the above regulations is carried out through routine inspections to workplaces.
sentences.chinese: 该部借着例行视察工作地点执行上述规例。

sentences.english: Regulation of land use right transfer prices, control the cost of land.
sentences.chinese: 规例的土地使用权转让价格，控制土地的费用。

sentences.english: The amendment regulation will be effective on 1 July 2010.
sentences.chinese: 修订规例将会由二零一零年七月一日起生效。

sentences.english: To comply with all relevant laws and regulations.
sentences.chinese: 遵守所有相关的法例和规例。

sentences.english: Familiar with the rules and regulations issued by PBOC and SAFE.
sentences.chinese: 的规则和规例发出中国人民银行和国家外汇熟悉。

definition: to stipulate/to state expressly/to explicitly provide for
to stipulate/to state expressly/to explicitly provide for
to set/to designate/to stipulate/to provide/to draw up/to formulate (rules etc)/stipulation
to adopt (a system, policy, strategy etc)
